title: Pathian hmangaihnain ka thinlung sual a hneh
lyrics:
Pathian hmangaihnain ka thinlung sual a hneh,
Khawvel sual lainatin a Fa neih chhun a pe.

A ring a piang boral lova,
Chatuana nunna an neih nan (2)

Nunna leh chhandamna a tuarnain a pe,
Kraws chungah thisen hlu mi tin tan a luang a.

Sual man thihna a ni, boral hlauhawm ka ni,
Mahse, i khawngaihna thu a awm, mi tin tan.

Khawvel thiam loh chan nan Krista a lo kal lo,
Mi sual tinreng tlan nan a nunna a pe zo.
